name: lotusagi
description: AI-powered coding assistant with multi-agent system and plugin ecosystem

scripts.dev:install: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:env: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Environment file created. Please edit .env with your API keys.'
scripts.setup:db: echo 'Setting up database...' && (sudo -u postgres createdb lotusagi 2>/dev/null || echo 'Database might already exist')
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.install:full: npm run install:full:deps && npm run setup
scripts.install:full:deps: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.install:plugin: cd backend && npm install axios cheerio && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
